subject: SPRO-P2-H2 and VAM Pro Linear Motor
description_text:
Hi.
I am the owner of the SPRO-P2-H2, and I would like to know if the
controller of the PRO X is compatible in order to use the VAM Pro Linear
Motor.
Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Eduardo Odriozola,    Of course you can, but you need to buy an additional control box for Plus X.
